snippet: Senator Rand Paul of Kentucky appeared to stumble when he stepped into a controversy over vaccine mandates on Monday night, but his bigger problem may be backlash from women.
abstract: Senator Rand Paul of Kentucky appeared to stumble when he stepped into a controversy over vaccine mandates on Monday night, but his bigger problem may be backlash from women.

headline.main: Rand Paul Shushes Interviewer, and Some Women See Sexism
